actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the meat import law to reduce the amount of meat permitted to be imported into the United States during any calendar year by the amount, if any, by which actual imports during the preceding calendar year exceeded the quota for that year, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the provisions of Federal law which provide quotas for the beef, goat, and sheep imports to require the quota for any year to be reduced by the amount of excess meat imported the previous year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the meat import law to reduce the amount of meat permitted to be imported into the United States during any calendar year by the amount, if any, by which actual imports during the preceding calendar year exceeded the quota for that year, and for other purposes.
